author: Joan Muwahed
title: Klobuchar shares update on husband, after he was hospitalized for coronavirus
description: She said because they were apart, she didn't take a COVID-19 test.
content:
The day after revealing her husband had tested positive for coronavirus and was hospitalized, Sen. Amy Klobuchar provided an update, saying he's still on oxygen.
Her husband, John Bessler, has suffered from a bleeding cough and "dangerously low" oxygen level… [+2835 chars]
